name: The Great Debate
description: The Regency Council continues its endless debate on who shall be elected the next King of Poland.

name: A True Polish King!
description: With the election of Augustyn I Czartoryski, the new king must secure his position as the new monarch of a struggling nation.

name: A Clear Line of Succession
description: Poland's 20 years of weakness were caused by the lack of a strong king to lead the nation. We must reform our laws of succession so that there will always be a King of Poland, and that a Regency Council will never again hold sway over the nation's future.

name: Write A New Constitution
description: With a new Polish King comes a new era in Poland's history, and with it must come a new set of laws. Drafting a new constitution is the first step in defining this new era in Poland's history.

name: The People's King
description: Augustyn I Czartoryski, or "The People's King" as he is becoming known, serves as a unifying force throughout the nation, encouraging Polish soldiers to defend their homes with tooth and nail, and force the enemy to bleed for every inch of Polish soil they take.

name: A von Habsburg!
description: With the election of Karl Olbracht von Habsburg, the new king must secure his position as the new monarch of a struggling nation.

name: Lessons of the Empire
description: Austria has had plentiful experience in dealing with mending rifts between minorities, and by using their experiences, we can mend the rifts between the different peoples in our nation, as well.

name: Return of Galicia
description: With the brotherly relationship between our new King [POL.GetLeader] and [AUS.GetLeader], we can use this opportunity to peaceably press our claims to Galicia, a region that has been a historical part of the Polish Kingdom since ages long past...

name: Rebuilding [88.GetCapitalVictoryPointName]
description: Now that [88.GetCapitalVictoryPointName] has been returned to us, it would benefit us greatly to reincorporate the existing infrastructure into our own. The city has seen lacklustre support under the Austrian thumb, and under our care the historic city will flourish anew.

name: Membership in the Vienna Circle
description: Our relationship with Austria is strong, and we need to take advantage of this by sharing our technologies so that we both may benefit from each other's military expertise.

name: An Absolute Monarch
description: Poland was weak without a monarch at the helm of the nation. We need to ensure this never happens again, and the power of the monarch must be absolute if Poland is to be great again.

name: Abolish the Sejm
description: The Sejm is a weak and dying institution, and their "elections" only serve to further fracture and divide the people. We need to do away with this relic of the past, and rest all power in the hands of the monarch.

name: Reform the Monarchy
description: The nation stands fractured and weak, by reforming the monarchy and reducing the power of the King, we stand to bring the nation into the modern era.

name: Citizen's Rights
description: Drafting a new set of laws to empower the citizens of the nation will result in a more educated, loyal, and productive population.

name: The New Sejm
description: The Sejm has remained unchanged since the nation's resurrection at the end of the Weltkrieg. There are numerous loopholes and inefficiencies that could be rectified by reconstituting the Sejm, and would benefit the nation greatly.

name: A German King!
description: With the election of August Wilhelm von Hohenzollern, the new king must secure his position as the new monarch of a struggling nation.

name: Invite German Advisors
description: Reforming our military and political structure is of the utmost importance if we are to remain politically relevant in Europe. By taking advantage of our close ties with Germany, we can allow them to send us advisors to modernise our armed forces.
POL_german_tech_sharing

name: Hold Joint Exercises
description: Even with war looming on the horizon, it is important to give our troops the most experience we can give them. With our close ties to Germany, there is a possibility of holding join exercises with the German military, something that is sure to benefit our troops and commanders greatly.

name: Joining The European Economic Bloc
description: Our new political situation has offered us the unique opportunity to join Germany's Economic Bloc. By doing so, we can strengthen our economy and secure vital trade deals with neighbouring countries.

name: A Lithuanian King!
description: With the election of Vytautas II, the new king must secure his position as the new monarch of a struggling nation.

name: A Victory of the People
description: The Syndicalists have overthrown the corrupt and decadent government of the past, and now stands ready to lead Poland into a bright and glorious future

name: Redistribute the Wealth
description: The old monarchy had cruelly seized all of the nation's wealth for itself, crushing the polish people under their gilded boot-heels. We must redistribute this wealth to the people!

name: Empower the Województwa
description: We must hand back the power to the people, and allow themselves to be in charge of their own defences. We shall allow every Województwa to maintain and control their own small local militia forces, so that they may better defend their own lands and interests.

name: Kon In Control
description: Feliks Kon must solidify his position as the leader of the Polish nation if he is to accomplish his goals.

name: All Under One
description: We must begin a blistering propaganda campaign to bring all the Polish people in line under Kon, so that he may move the nation forward as one.

name: Economic Solidarity
description: With a new government comes new economic policy. All nations who do not follow the rightful Syndicalist banner cannot strip Poland of her rightful resources!

name: Polish Exceptionalism
description: The Polish people must be taught that they are exceptional, that they are the strongest and greatest people in all of Europe. In doing so, they will fight harder and longer in time of war, and work harder and longer in times of peace.

name: Róża Luksemburg's World Revolution
description: Renowned revolutionary Róża Luksemburg's rise to power signifies a crucial policy shift outward and towards the spread of Syndicalism worldwide. Whether or not she can make good on those promises remains to be seen.

name: Establish New Communes
description: We must move the nation's power out of the hands of the bourgeois and into the hands of the people. New and stronger communes will enhance the ability of the people to defend themselves against capitalist influences, and strengthen the resolve of our people.

name: Fund the Schools of Mathematics
description: Poland's Schools of Mathematics are renowned throughout the world. By giving them generous amounts of funding, we can reap the rewards and advance our technological prowess.

name: Research Cities
description: It is individual initiatives that will power the technological advancements of the future. We must establish specific cities of learning in order to encourage our brightest minds to communicate and advance the frontiers of science together.

name: Revival of Leninist Ideals
description: Jakub Hanecki's sudden leadership of the Polish people will bring with it a revival of the old Leninist ideals which have been lost to the other Syndicalist powers of the world. These ideals will bring a unique strength to Poland which will empower her for years to come.

name: Spreading the Revolution
description: The revolution defies borders, and must be spread as far and wide as it possibly can be!

name: The Ministry of Public Security
description: We must establish the Ministry of Public Security to weed out insurrectionist elements inside the new regime, and to expand our intelligence capabilities across the globe.

name: International Polish Agents
description: If we are to perform international acts of subversion in the name of Syndicalism, we must first gather like-minded individuals in other nations. Polish citizens living abroad are the perfect candidates for recruitment.

name: Not Yet Lost
description: The toppling of the old regime and the dawn of a new Polish state comes with it a new optimism. Poland is not yet lost, and the people must rally to her cause.

name: Beacon of Polish Spirit
description: The new Polish nation stands as a beacon of the Polish spirit, drawing all true Poles to defend her in the coming wars. Poland remains a bastion of her people, and shall stand tall and true!

name: Poland Forever
description: Even if Poland is destroyed, even if the Polish state collapses into ruin, the Polish spirit will not be destroyed. Poland will live on forever in the hearts of the Polish people, and it will rise again, even if it takes another century of struggle.

name: A New Poland
description: The Kingdom is dead, long live the Republic! It is time for the nation to move forward under the new banner of democracy, and secure our future as a free and independent state.

name: Hold Free Elections
description: With the dawn of the new Republic, emergency elections must be held to create the new Sejm. These elections will likely set Poland's course for years to come, and many radical parties are vying for control.

name: International Trade Reform
description: Poland is economically stunted, much of it due to the conservative trading policies of the old Kingdom. With a set of dramatic reforms, Poland's economy can be more competitive on the world stage and draw the nation closer to her trading partners overseas.

name: Decree Women's Suffrage
description: With the coming of a new Republic should come the rebirth of the Polish people. No motion would be more symbolic than giving all Poles, man or woman, the right to vote.

name: Fund the Schools of Mathematics
description: Poland's Schools of Mathematics are renowned throughout the world. By giving them generous amounts of funding, we can reap the rewards and advance our technological prowess.

name: Join the International Community
description: As a new nation, it is our responsibility to re-enter the world stage as a strong and independent nation, and forge new ties where they were lost after the fall of the Kingdom.

name: Russian Artillery Designs
description: With our newfound alliance with Russia, it would be of great benefit to Poland if we were to work with the Russians on new and improved artillery designs for our own forces.

name: German Armour Designs
description: Our latest ties with Germany and the Reichspakt has allowed us to access to latest German Panzer designs. Though clearly Polish armour is superior, it wouldn't hurt looking at what they have come up with...

name: Crush the Monarchists
description: Even with the new Polish state rising from the ashes of the old Kingdom, there are many who wish to see the return of the King. We must take every opportunity to seek them out and eradicate them, for the stability of the nation.

name: A Firm Hand
description: A strong sense of Polish nationalism has won the day, and the new government must now work hard to unite the people of Poland under one banner.

name: The Stab in the Back
description: Poland was promised many things during the Weltkrieg, and we were given almost nothing, reduced to a small shell of a nation, weak and ineffectual in our ambitions. We have been stabbed in the back by our so called "allies", and it is time for Poland to take what is hers.

name: Polish Militarism
description: The people of Poland have been cheated out of what we were rightfully owed, and they know it. We must whip the people into a frenzy of nationalism, so that we may fill our ranks with proud soldiers to fuel the coming conflicts.

name: Fortress Poland
description: Poland is surrounded by enemies on all sides. If we are to survive, we must create a strong network of fortifications to protect our heartland from foreign invaders. We shall not be so easily destroyed.

name: The New Polish Opportunism
description: With the ever-shifting state of politics in Europe, the Polish people must remain vigilant. We must always be ready to strike, to take advantage of the turmoil around us so as to ensure Poland comes out on top.

name: Dismantle the Government
description: The old administration still lingers and is a stain on our new state. It is time to completely eliminate it and march forward a new and proud nation.

name: Imprison Minor Politicians
description: We have no need for these vile conmen. They will be sent to labour and toil in the prisons where they belong.

name: Recruit Civil Servants
description: Our regime will not survive without the technical knowledge of the old bureaucrats and while it pains us we must add them to our ranks.

name: Establish the Ministry of Propaganda
description: Our regime is still young and unpopular. The people must be taught how our rule is just and fair.

name: Found New Technical Colleges
description: Education will give way to the future of warfare and thus we must begin to establish new military technical colleges to prepare the youth.

name: The New Central Industrial Region
description: Poland is a nation of farms and agriculture, but if we are to enter the modern age, we must become a nation of factories and industry. Centralising our infrastructure is the first step towards a full industrial revolution.

name: The State Road Fund
description: Much of Poland's farming is still being done with antiquated methods, unfit for the 20th century. We must introduce these farmers to modern machinery to improve their capabilities.

name: Scheibler and Grohman Works
description: Giving the Scheibler and Grohman Works authority over the Lodz region will allow them to increase their steel production drastically, and further fuel the fires of Polish industry.

name: Restructure the Bank of Poland
description: The Bank of Poland is the largest bank in the nation, and has failed in the wake of Black Monday. Restructuring the bank and saving it from total collapse is the first step in our recovery from the Black Monday disaster.

name: Reintroduce the Złoty
description: Poland has used the Mark ever since the end of the Weltkrieg. Now that German currency is in free-fall, it is time to reintroduce a new Polish currency, the Złoty.

name: Private Research Initiatives
description: The private sector, long-ignored as a means of economic development, should be encouraged to instigate their own initiatives and further their own research.

name: The New Polish Worker
description: We must introduce a new culture of hard work and strong men in order to fill our factories. This "New Polish Worker" will be the backbone of our new industry.

name: Modernise Congress Poland
description: Congress Poland has long been an agricultural centre of the nation, however that land could be better used in order to create more factories for our war effort.

name: Industrial Expansion
description: Funding the expansion of industrial corporations across the country will further increase the industrial capacity of the nation.

name: Warszawa Główna Railway Station
description: Poland sits in the centre of Europe, which allows us a strong opportunity to present ourselves as the railway hub of Europe. These new rail lines could prove a valuable asset in encouraging trade with neighbouring countries.

name: Munitions Districts
description: By setting aside specific districts in each city for military and munitions production, we can create special infrastructure which facilitates the production of arms and improve our industrial capacity.

name: Stalowa Wola
description: Factories are the way of the future, and we need more of them if we are to remain competitive on the world stage.

name: Contemporary Assembly Lines
description: Even with new factories populating our cities, we still need to improve our concepts of how they should work. By introducing modern assembly lines we can improve the efficiency of our factories country-wide.

name: Panstwowe Wytwórnie Uzbrojenia
description: The Panstwowe Wytwórnie Uzbrojenia is an industrial conglomerate that controls a large portion of Polish arms manufacturing. Increasing their authority and giving them leniency in the law will allow them to further strengthen Polish arms manufacturing.

name: Establish Border Forts
description: The eastern frontiers are almost defenceless. We need to create a series of interlocking fortifications so that any attack from the east will not catch us unprepared.

name: Defensive Tactics
description: Poland finds herself surrounded on all sides by nations that have no love for her. If we are to survive, we must make it so that the enemy pays for every inch of ground they take with blood, and that our armies stand ready to defend every inch of Polish soil.

name: The Next War's Army
description: Most of Poland's army is still using equipment from the Weltkrieg. There is a new war coming, and we must be prepared for it.

name: New Age Cavalry
description: The age of horses is over, but the age of Motorised infantry has begun. We must invest in trucks and other motorised equipment to prepare for the next war.

name: The New Winged Hussars
description: Even many years after the last Winged Hussar rode into battle, the spirit of the Winged Hussars remain with us, empowering our cavalry and emboldening our spirits.

name: An Offensive Fighting Force
description: Poland finds herself surrounded on all sides by nations that have no love for her. But it is not enough to merely sit back and watch as our enemies plan around us. It is we who must make the first strike, and destroy our enemies before they can destroy us.

name: Combined Arms
description: Wars are not fought with just an army, but rather with a combination of infantry, armour, and an air force. We must make use of this combined arms theory by teaching our officers proper military techniques.

name: Flesh to Steel
description: Steel is the future, and Panzers are the embodiment of this future. We must create our own designs and set them loose on the battlefield to strike down our enemies.

name: The '9-tonne Polish' Programme
description: The '9-tonne Polish' programme is a Polish military initiative to re-purpose old German Panzer designs to suit our own needs. The original model under consideration was the German Kätzchen, but shifts in the political landscape could lean the initiative in a different direction.

name: Import Foreign Rifles
description: To kick-start our military modernisation, we must first import large quantities of foreign rifles and study their innovations before creating our own rifle.

name: The New Polish Rifle
description: Come a time of war, we cannot rely on importing our rifles from another nation. It is time to create our own rifle design and propagate it throughout the army.

name: Integrated Infantry Tactics
description: We must focus on improving our soldiers when they are still in training, so that they are well prepared when the bullets begin flying.

name: Modern Military Thought
description: No longer are wars fought in trenches and from strong fortifications. Modern military thought relies on swift manoeuvring and quick reactions. Our military staff must study these techniques in order to remain competitive on the world stage.

name: Polish Military Design Bureau
description: We must establish an official Polish Military Design Bureau to consolidate the many different research divisions in our military.

name: A New Air Force
description: Poland's air force is in a state of disrepair. We need to pull the air force out of the last war and into the modern era if we are to fight toe-to-toe with the other powers of Europe.

name: Experiment with RADAR
description: RADAR is a new technology in the field of warfare, and one we have no experience with. If we can harness this technology, our air force will be more competitive in the skies.

name: Personal Pilot Radios
description: By giving each pilot his own personal radio, we can allow them to communicate with each other in combat situations and greatly increase their ability to perform complex manoeuvres.

name: Revised Air Combat Tactics
description: Observing international air tactics will allow us to reform our own air force in their image, creating a stronger air force for little cost to us.

name: Expand our Air Defences
description: Even if Poland cannot afford to create a strong air force of her own, we can still afford to shoot down other nation's air forces. Improving our national anti-air defences will certainly come in handy in the event of hostilities.

name: Destroy Their Foot-Soldiers
description: By focusing our bombers on the enemy's soldiers, we can destroy their morale and hinder their ability to fight an effective campaign by raining death from above.

name: Destroy Their Homes
description: By focusing our bombers on the enemy's homes, we can destroy their infrastructure and win our battles before any foot soldier can even fire his rifle.

name: Combat Air Superiority
description: Our air force exists to support our soldiers on the ground, and we must improve our support tactics to reflect this priority.

name: From Biplane to Fighter
description: Biplanes are not the air force of the future. If Poland's fighters are to remain anything but target practice the nation must modernise our designs in time for the next war.

name: Kick-start the New Navy
description: Poland has gained access to the sea again, and we must quickly begin to build new naval infrastructure if the Polish navy is to sail once more.

name: Naval Buildup in Gdansk
description: Having retaken the historic city of Gdansk, we must use its massive ports and naval infrastructure to build a new Baltic fleet that will be the envy of Europe.

name: New Naval Officers
description: With a new navy comes new naval officers. We must scour the country for sailors of note to train the new class of naval officers in the coming years.

name: Naval Interdiction Strategies
description: Rather than rebuilding a traditional navy, a process that may take decades, we should instead focus on precision strikes, to hit the enemy where it hurts most.

name: Unrestricted Submarine Warfare
description: We should look to examples of the past to plan our future. Unrestricted Submarine Warfare has proven to be brutally effective in the past, and there is no reason it cannot work for us in the present.

name: The New Polish Navy
description: If we are to stand proud among the great nations of Europe again, we must build a new, modern navy that can challenge the great powers of Europe and the world.

name: Pride of the Baltic
description: No navy is complete without a flagship to lead it. We must begin the planning and construction of a new model of Battleship to lead the Polish fleet in the years to come.

name: Foreign Polish Expeditions
description: The future of Poland rests not only at home, but overseas as well. Being so long without a coastline, we must work hard to create a new set of tactics for extending our might overseas, so that no enemy may escape our reach.

name: Lithuanian Shipbuilding
description: Poland as it is has no access to the sea, but Lithuania does. By exploiting Lithuania's coastline we can begin the creation of our own new navy.
